00020 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00021 
00022 //this is a routine to hold 'probe selection' numerics
00023 // i.e. logistic regression, etc
00024 
00025 #include "algorithm/selector/ProbeSelector.h"
00026 //
00027 
00028 double LogisticRegression(vector<double> &Summaries,
00029                           vector<double> &Predictor,
00030                           const vector<int> &TargetGenotypes,
00031                           const vector< vector<double> > &Covariates,
00032                           vector<double> PriorMeans,
00033                           vector<double> PriorWeights,
00034                           int loopMax,
00035                           double Converged) {
00036     int nobs, npred;
00037     int i,j;
00038     double convergeCheck;
00039     
00040 //vector<double> priorm;
00041 //      vector<double> weightm;
00042 //      priorm.resize(3);
00043 //      weightm.resize(3);
00044 //      priorm[0] = 0.66;
00045 //      priorm[1] = 0;
00046 //      priorm[2] = -0.66;
00047 //      weightm[0] = 1;
00048 //      weightm[1] = 0.5;
00049 //      weightm[2] = 1;
00050 
00051     nobs = TargetGenotypes.size();
00052     npred = Covariates.size()+1;
00053     Summaries.clear();
00054     // logistic regression loop
00055     // 0,1,2 copies of the A allele in Y
00056     
00057     ColumnVector Y(nobs);
00058     ColumnVector En(nobs);
00059     ColumnVector Beta(npred);
00060     Matrix Xmat(nobs,npred);
00061 
00062     // fill in the ones that need initialization
00063     double safety = 0.5/nobs;
00064     double ssafety = safety*safety; // tiny value for variance
00065     for (i=0; i<nobs; i++)
00066         Y.element(i) = TargetGenotypes[i]+safety*(1-TargetGenotypes[i]);
00067     for (i=0; i<nobs; i++)
00068         En.element(i) = 2; // at most 2 alleles
00069     for (j=0; j<npred; j++)
00070         Beta.element(j) = 0; // everything het
00071     for (i=0; i<nobs; i++) {
00072         Xmat.element(i,0) = 1; // intercept
00073         for (j=1; j<npred; j++) {
00074             Xmat.element(i,j) = Covariates[j-1][i];
00075             //cout << Covariates[j-1][i] << "\t";
00076         }
00077     }
00078 
00079     //cout << "initialized" << endl;
00080     // scratch variables used for IWLS iterations
00081     Matrix WXmat(nobs,npred);
00082     ColumnVector Weights(nobs);
00083     ColumnVector Nu(nobs);
00084     ColumnVector Mu(nobs);
00085     ColumnVector Vee(nobs);
00086     ColumnVector Zee(nobs);
00087     ColumnVector WZee(nobs);
00088     Matrix U, V;
00089     DiagonalMatrix D;
00090     ColumnVector Fitted(nobs);
00091     ColumnVector BetaNew(npred);
00092     ColumnVector Delta(npred);
00093     
00094     int loop=0;
00095     bool done= false;
00096     while (loop<loopMax && !done) {
00097         Nu = Xmat * Beta;
00098         for (i=0; i<nobs; i++) {
00099             Mu.element(i) = 1/(1+exp(-Nu.element(i)));
00100             Vee.element(i) = Mu.element(i)*(1-Mu.element(i));
00101             if (Vee.element(i)<ssafety) { // prevent divide by zero errors and zero weights
00102                 Vee.element(i) = ssafety;
00103             }
00104             Zee.element(i) = Nu.element(i) + (Y.element(i)/En.element(i)-Mu.element(i))/Vee.element(i);
00105             Weights.element(i) = En.element(i) * Vee.element(i);
00106             Weights.element(i) = sqrt(Weights.element(i));
00107             WZee.element(i) = Zee.element(i) * Weights.element(i);
00108             for (j=0; j<npred; j++)
00109                 WXmat.element(i,j) = Xmat.element(i,j) * Weights.element(i);
00110         }
00111         //cout << "SVD" << loop << "\t";
00112         //cout << Vee;
00113         //cout << WXmat;
00114         SVD(WXmat,D,U,V);
00115         
00116         Fitted = U.t() * WZee;
00117         //cout << D;
00118         //cout << "d.i" << "\t";
00119         //cout << D.i();
00120         BetaNew = V * ( D.i() * Fitted );
00121         //cout << "delta" << "\t";
00122         Delta = Beta-BetaNew;
00123         
00124         convergeCheck = Delta.SumSquare();
00125         Beta = BetaNew;
00126         loop++;
00127         if (convergeCheck<Converged)
00128             done=true;
00129         //cout << loop << endl;
00130         //cout << Beta << endl;
00131     }
00132     vector<double> gcor,gobs;
00133     gcor.resize(3);
00134     gobs.resize(3);
00135     gcor[0]=gcor[1]=gcor[2] = 0.001;
00136     gobs[0]=gobs[1]=gobs[2] = 0.001;
00137     
00138     double correct,bestguess, tmp;
00139     int best;
00140     double  mcor;
00141     double tcor;
00142     
00143     Nu = Xmat * Beta;
00144     for (i=0; i<nobs; i++) {
00145         // make "calls"
00146         Mu.element(i) = 1/(1+exp(-Nu.element(i)));
00147         Vee.element(i) = Mu.element(i)*(1-Mu.element(i));
00148         if (Vee.element(i)<ssafety) {// prevent div0
00149             Vee.element(i) = ssafety;
00150         }
00151         best = 1;
00152         bestguess = 1000000;
00153         for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00154             tmp = (j/En.element(i)-Mu.element(i))/Vee.element(i);
00155             tmp = fabs(tmp);
00156             if (j==1) {
00157                 tmp /= 2; // het stretch -logistic
00158             }
00159             if (tmp<bestguess) {
00160                 bestguess=tmp;
00161                 best = j;
00162             }
00163         }
00164         gobs[TargetGenotypes[i]] +=1;
00165         if (best==TargetGenotypes[i]) {
00166             gcor[TargetGenotypes[i]] +=1;
00167         }
00168     }
00169 
00170 
00171     mcor = (gcor[0]+gcor[2])/(gobs[0]+gobs[2]);
00172     Summaries.push_back(mcor);
00173     tcor = gcor[1]/gobs[1];
00174     Summaries.push_back(tcor);
00175     correct =(gcor[0]+gcor[1]+gcor[2])/(gobs[0]+gobs[1]+gobs[2]);
00176     Summaries.push_back(correct);
00177     
00178     // FLD computation
00179     
00180     vector<double> sq,tq,ssq,mq;
00181     double cvar, fld;
00182     
00183     tq.resize(3);
00184     mq.resize(3);
00185     sq.resize(3);
00186     ssq.resize(3);
00187     // sneak prior in here
00188     tq[0] = PriorWeights[0];
00189     tq[1] = PriorWeights[1];
00190     tq[2] = PriorWeights[2];
00191     sq[0] = PriorMeans[0]*PriorWeights[0];
00192     sq[1] = PriorMeans[1]*PriorWeights[1];
00193     sq[2] = PriorMeans[2]*PriorWeights[2];
00194     ssq[0] = PriorMeans[0]*PriorMeans[0]*PriorWeights[0];
00195     ssq[1] = PriorMeans[1]*PriorMeans[1]*PriorWeights[1];
00196     ssq[2] = PriorMeans[2]*PriorMeans[2]*PriorWeights[2];
00197     for (i=0; i<nobs; i++) {
00198         sq[TargetGenotypes[i]] += Covariates[0][i];
00199         tq[TargetGenotypes[i]] += 1;
00200         ssq[TargetGenotypes[i]] += Covariates[0][i]*Covariates[0][i];
00201     }
00202     double epsilon = 0.001;
00203     cvar = 0.1*epsilon; // smooth
00204     cvar +=  ssq[0]+ssq[1]+ssq[2];
00205     cvar -= sq[0]*sq[0]/tq[0];
00206     cvar -= sq[1]*sq[1]/tq[1];
00207     cvar -= sq[2]*sq[2]/tq[2];
00208     cvar /= tq[0]+tq[1]+tq[2]+epsilon;
00209     cvar = sqrt(cvar); // stddev
00210     mq[0] = sq[0]/tq[0];
00211     mq[1] = sq[1]/tq[1];
00212     mq[2] = sq[2]/tq[2];
00213     Summaries.push_back(mq[0]);
00214     Summaries.push_back(mq[1]);
00215     Summaries.push_back(mq[2]);
00216     Summaries.push_back(tq[0]);
00217     Summaries.push_back(tq[1]);
00218     Summaries.push_back(tq[2]);
00219     Summaries.push_back(cvar);
00220     fld = -1*(mq[1]-mq[0])/cvar;
00221     Summaries.push_back(fld);
00222     fld = -1*(mq[2]-mq[1])/cvar;
00223     Summaries.push_back(fld);
00224     fld = -1*(mq[2]-mq[0])/cvar;
00225     Summaries.push_back(fld);
00226     double entropy;
00227     entropy = tq[0]*log(tq[0])+tq[1]*log(tq[1])+tq[2]*log(tq[2])-(tq[0]+tq[1]+tq[2])*log(tq[0]+tq[1]+tq[2]);
00228     entropy = -1*entropy;
00229     Summaries.push_back(entropy);
00230     // export fitted value for logistic regression
00231     Predictor.resize(npred);
00232     
00233     for (i=0; i<npred; i++)
00234         Predictor[i]=Beta.element(i);
00235     
00236     // compute log-likelihood
00237     // Mu = pr(1)
00238     double p,q,LL;
00239     LL = 0;
00240     
00241     for (i=0; i<nobs; i++) {
00242         // safety to avoid zero
00243         p = (Mu.element(i)+ssafety)/(1+2*ssafety);
00244         q = 1-p;
00245         LL += Y.element(i)*log(p) + (En.element(i)-Y.element(i))*log(q);
00246     }
00247     //cout << "exited safely" << endl;
00248     Summaries.push_back(-2*LL+2*npred);
00249     //return(correct);
00250     return(-2*LL+2*npred);
00251 }
Generated on Tue Jul 15 2014 10:37:20 for Affymetrix Power Tools by  1.7.1
